```
typedef struct IODetailedTimingInformationV2 {
    ...

negative).[`horizontalSyncLevel`](/documentation/iokit/iodetailedtiminginformationv2/1505554-horizontalsynclevel)Zero.[`horizontalSyncOffset`](/documentation/iokit/iodetailedtiminginformationv2/1505654-horizontalsyncoffset)First error.[`minPixelClock`](/documentation/iokit/iodetailedtiminginformationv2/1506146-minpixelclock)Minimum pixel clock frequency in Hz, with error.[`numLinks`](/documentation/iokit/iodetailedtiminginformationv2/1505253-numlinks)number of links to be used by a dual link timing, if zero, assume one link.[`pixelClock`](/documentation/iokit/iodetailedtiminginformationv2/1505625-pixelclock)Pixel clock frequency in Hz.[`pixelEncoding`](/documentation/iokit/iodetailedtiminginformationv2/2937889-pixelencoding)[`scalerFlags`](/documentation/iokit/iodetailedtiminginformationv2/1505247-scalerflags)If the mode is scaled, kIOScaleStretchToFit may be set to allow stretching. kIOScaleRotateFlags is mask which may have the value given by kIOScaleRotate90, kIOScaleRotate180, kIOScaleRotate270 to display a rotated setup.[`signalLevels`](/documentation/iokit/iodetailedtiminginformationv2/1505108-signallevels)Specifies the signal level. [`verticalActive`](/documentation/iokit/iodetailedtiminginformationv2/1505884-verticalactive)Number of lines per frame.[`verticalBlanking`](/documentation/iokit/iodetailedtiminginformationv2/1505807-verticalblanking)Blanking lines per frame.[`verticalBlankingExtension`](/documentation/iokit/iodetailedtiminginformationv2/2870095-verticalblankingextension)[`verticalBlankingMaxShrinkPerFrame`](/documentation/iokit/iodetailedtiminginformationv2/3753269-verticalblankingmaxshrinkperfram)[`verticalBlankingMaxStretchPerFrame`](/documentation/iokit/iodetailedtiminginformationv2/3753270-verticalblankingmaxstretchperfra)[`verticalBorderBottom`](/documentation/iokit/iodetailedtiminginformationv2/1506113-verticalborderbottom)Number of lines in bottom vertical border.[`verticalBorderTop`](/documentation/iokit/iodetailedtiminginformationv2/1505205-verticalbordertop)Number of lines in top vertical border.[`verticalScaled`](/documentation/iokit/iodetailedtiminginformationv2/1505368-verticalscaled)If the mode is scaled, sets the size of the image before scaling or rotation.[`verticalScaledInset`](/documentation/iokit/iodetailedtiminginformationv2/1505081-verticalscaledinset)If the mode is scaled, sets the number of active lines to remove the top and bottom edges in order to display an underscanned image.[`verticalSyncConfig`](/documentation/iokit/iodetailedtiminginformationv2/1506078-verticalsyncconfig)kIOSyncPositivePolarity for positive polarity vertical sync (0 for negative).[`verticalSyncLevel`](/documentation/iokit/iodetailedtiminginformationv2/1505614-verticalsynclevel)Zero.[`verticalSyncOffset`](/documentation/iokit/iodetailedtiminginformationv2/1506166-verticalsyncoffset)First line of vertical sync.[`verticalSyncPulseWidth`](/documentation/iokit/iodetailedtiminginformationv2/1505756-verticalsyncpulsewidth)Height of vertical sync.
